Package oracle.adf.view.faces.bi.component.geoMap

Interface Summary
MapConstants  
StyleThemeFOI  
 

Class Summary
BarChartThemeFOI This complex attribute class display bar charts on a map.
BarThemeInfoItem This complex attributes defines a bar of a bar chart in a barChartTheme
BarThemeInfoSet This complex attributes contains a set that has all the BarThemeInfoItem
ColorThemeFOI This complex attributes class will display a color theme on the map.
DataContent  
LegendContent  
LegendItem  
MapConfiguration  
MapInfoCallbackObject  
MapStyleReader Copyright (c) 2006, 2014, Oracle and/or its affiliates.
MapUtil Copyright (c) 2008, 2014, Oracle and/or its affiliates.
NSDPTheme This is the base class for all theme class that needs a predefined theme name, a location column to display data on the map This is the base class for ColorThemeFOI, BarChartThemeFOI and PieChartThemeFOI.
PieChartThemeFOI This complex attribute class display pie charts on a map.
PointContent  
PointFOI This complex attribute class display points on a map with user defined images or HTML content
PointStyleItem This complex attributes defines a point style item of a point theme.
PointStyleSet This complex attributes contains a set that has all the point style item
PredefinedThemeFOI  
Slice This complex attributes defines a slice of the pie charts in a pieChartTheme
SliceSet This complex attributes contains a set that has all the slice
ThemeFOI This complex attributes class will display a theme on the map.
ThemeSelectionDialog Copyright (c) 2008, 2013, Oracle and/or its affiliates.
UIGeoMap ADF Faces Custom component - Map The map supports the display of business data on a geographic map with multiple layers of information as theme.
UIGeoMapLegend This complex attributes let developers to customize the map legend of a map
UIGeoMapToolbar ADF Faces Custom component - MapToolbar This component contains tools for turning on/off themes, selecting theme elements, zooming, calculating distance and area for the selected regions, displaying legend, and showing the spatial coordinates of the mouse location.
UIGeoOverviewMap This complex attributes let developers to customize the overview map
